title: Mailvox: another old chestnut
author: VD
content_html:
Aaron fails the first test:

News flash: Vox Day is NOT a libertarian. See this link for proof:

I’ll get to this in more detail later this weekend, but it’s quite simple to refute. Libertarianism is a POLITICAL ideology, not a moral framework or a religion. Regardless of one’s morality or religious faith, one can subscribe to a political viewpoint which refuses to impose it on others.

I daresay that Aaron can’t point to a single example of where I betray libertarian values – with the possible exception of abortion, a subject wherein I have already explained that the Libertarian Party position is in error – due to my Christian faith.
